avalancheActivity.comment:
The fresh wind slabs can be released by a single winter sport participant above the tree line. On steep slopes and in gullies and bowls, and behind abrupt changes in the terrain medium-sized and, in isolated cases, large dry slab avalanches are possible. At elevated altitudes the avalanche prone locations are more prevalent.
Medium-sized and, in isolated cases, large dry loose snow avalanches are possible as a consequence of the new snow. In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The new snow and wind slabs represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment: As a consequence of new snow and wind, wind slabs will form. Snow depths vary greatly at intermediate and high altitudes, depending on the infuence of the wind. In particular at low and intermediate altitudes hardly any snow is lying.

avalancheActivity.comment:
The fresh wind slabs can be released even by a single winter sport participant above the tree line. On steep slopes and in gullies and bowls, and behind abrupt changes in the terrain small and medium-sized dry slab avalanches are possible. At elevated altitudes the avalanche prone locations are more prevalent.
Small and medium-sized dry loose snow avalanches are possible as a consequence of the new snow. In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the hard snow surface. In localities where more snow falls the avalanche danger is greater.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Unexpected weather pattern: In localities where more snow falls the avalanche danger is greater. The new snow and wind slabs represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment: As a consequence of new snow and wind, wind slabs will form. Snow depths vary greatly at intermediate and high altitudes, depending on the infuence of the wind. In particular at low and intermediate altitudes a little snow is lying.

avalancheActivity.comment: As the day progresses, a few moist snow slides are possible. The new snow is lying on the favourable surface of an old snowpack. The fresh wind slabs can only be released by large loads in most cases.
avalancheActivity.highlights: The new snow will be deposited on the quite favourable surface of an old snowpack. From a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying.

snowpackStructure.comment: As a consequence of new snow and wind, mostly small wind slabs will form. Snow depths vary greatly at intermediate and high altitudes, depending on the infuence of the wind. In particular at low and intermediate altitudes a little snow is lying.

avalancheActivity.comment: As the day progresses, individual moist snow slides are possible. The new snow is lying on the favourable surface of an old snowpack. The fresh wind slabs can be released in isolated cases.
avalancheActivity.highlights: In localities where more snow falls the avalanche danger is greater. From a snow sport perspective, in most cases insufficient snow is lying.

snowpackStructure.comment: As a consequence of new snow and wind, small wind slabs will form above approximately 1600 m. The snowpack will be subject to considerable local variations. In particular at low and intermediate altitudes a little snow is lying.
